blurb:
My name is Federico Mora Rocha. I am a Ph.D. student in computer science at the University of California, Berkeley, where I am advised by Sanjit A. Seshia.

I received an M.Sc. in computer science from the University of Toronto, where I was advised by Marsha Chechik. I received a B.Sc. in computer science and mathematics from Mount Allison University.
